{-# LANGUAGE TemplateHaskell #-}
{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}

module Koshucode.Baala.Vanilla.Relmap
( koshu
, vanillaRelmaps
) where

import Koshucode.Baala.Vanilla.Relmap.Basic as Basic
import Koshucode.Baala.Vanilla.Value.Relval
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Kit as Kit
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax as Syn

-- | Quasiquoter for @[koshu| ... |]@.
koshu :: Kit.QuasiQuoter
koshu = Kit.koshuQuoter vanillaHalf [| vanillaFull |]

-- relmap constructors
vanillaHalf :: Kit.ConsHalfRelmap
vanillaFull :: Kit.ConsFullRelmap Val
(Kit.ConsRelmap vanillaHalf vanillaFull) = Kit.makeConsRelmap vanillaRelmaps

-- | Implementation of relational operators.
vanillaRelmaps :: [Kit.RelmapImplement Val]
vanillaRelmaps = minimalRelmaps ++ relmaps relmapParsers
    -- Relmap operators in alphabetical order
    [ ("hold -"   , hold2   , ["hold EXP ..."])
    , ("maybe R"  , maybe2  , ["maybe RELMAP ...",
                               "maybe RELMAP ... -share /NAME ..."])
    , ("rdf SRC"  , rdf     , ["rdf SIGN /SBJ /OBJ"])
    , ("unhold -" , unhold2 , ["unhold EXP ..."])
    , ("val -"    , val     , ["val /NEW EXP ..."])
    ] where

    hold2 :: Kit.ConsFullRelmap Val
    hold2 n args _ = do
          term <- args <!!> "term"
          Right $ Kit.calc n (holdBody (==) $ Syn.Branch 0 term) []

    maybe2 :: Kit.ConsFullRelmap Val
    maybe2 _ _ subs = do
          let (r:_) = subs
          Right $ Basic.maybe r

    rdf :: Kit.ConsFullRelmap Val
    rdf _ args _ = do
          [Syn.Bloom (Syn.Word _ sign)] <- args <!!> "sign"
          term  <- args <!!> "term"
          [s,o] <- Syn.termNames term
          Right $ relmapJoint [
                     relmapSource sign ["/s", "/o"],
                     relmapRename [(s,"/s"), (o,"/o")]]

    unhold2 :: Kit.ConsFullRelmap Val
    unhold2 n args _ = do
          term <- args <!!> "term"
          Right $ Kit.calc n (holdBody (/=) $ Syn.Branch 0 term) []

    val :: Kit.ConsFullRelmap Val
    val n args _ = do
          term <- args <!!> "term"
          Right $ Kit.calc n (valBody term) []
